meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I waitered at the restaurant and took orders from customers.
meanings.sent2: She waitered at the fancy hotel during the busy dinner rush.
meanings.sent3: The cat waitered around the table, pretending to take orders from the toy animals.
meanings.sent4: His mind waitered between serving tables and dreaming of becoming a chef one day.
meanings.sent5: The sun waitered slowly across the sky, casting long shadows over the outdoor dining area.

meanings.definition: To have been served by a waiter.
meanings.sent1: Last night, we waitered by a friendly waiter who recommended the special of the day.
meanings.sent2: They waitered by the experienced waiter who made sure their glasses were always full.
meanings.sent3: The teddy bear waitered by a tiny waiter doll, pretending to enjoy a fancy meal.
meanings.sent4: The memories of that evening waitered in their minds, bringing smiles to their faces.
meanings.sent5: The delicious aroma of the food waitered through the air, tempting everyone in the room.
